Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute near Roosevelt/Western
ShortDescription: #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Roosevelt/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near Roosevelt/Western.

Westbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, Damen, Taylor, Western, then resume their normal route on Roosevelt.

Eastbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, Western, Taylor, then resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Hamilton
ShortDescription: Westbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Damen, 59th, Western, and 63rd over normal route due to street blockage near 63rd/Hamilton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Damen, 59th, Western, and 63rd over normal route due to street blockage near 63rd/Hamilton.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer near Lawrence. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer near Lawrence.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
